titleStmt.title: Tuesday 29 Novemb. 1653. At the Councill of State at Whitehall. Ordered that Doctor Homes have the sole impression of the book lately published by him, entituled, The resurrection revealed, or, The dawning of the day-starre, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Council of State.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
